documents.document: "Our limits may not be where we think they are." -Chrissie Wellington at #IMKona awards ceremony
Sometimes your "PR" has nothing to do with time, but what you #conquer inside
“You cant get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.” ~Jerry West #running #quotes via @running_junkie
"Did you know that running uphill, at race pace; will strengthen your legs better than any weight training you could do?" via @JeffGalloway
To go fast, go alone; to go far, go together. -Warren Buffett via @CharityIdeas #run #endure
The big secret in #life is that there is no big secret. Whatever ur #goal, u can get there if u’re willing to work. -Oprah
"Coach said we do what's hard, to make us hard, which makes us hard to beat.” via @gosonja #run
"Choose to persist without exception." - Andy Andrews #run #distance
I've grown certain that the root of all #fear is that we've been forced to deny who we are. ~Frances Moore Lappe via @iheartquotes
Belief is a dream's accelerator and doubt its speed limit. #run #believe (via @AffirmationSpot
"We are designed to #run - and we increase our chance of daily #happiness when we do so." via @jeffgalloway
"You have to believe in yourself when no one else does; that makes you a winner right there." -- Venus Williams
Love and respect to the Men and Women who keep our country safe. We run for you! Happy Memorial Day
“You will never succeed beyond your wildest #dreams unless you are willing to have some wild dreams.”
#Passion is energy. Passion is desire. Passion makes you smiles when nobody is watching.
If you think something can never happen then you are forgetting what life is all about #miracles
It doesn't matter whether you come in first or last. It matters that you started and gave it all your #heart
Faster isn't always better. Remember where you came from.
The more I #practice, the luckier I get. -Jerry Barber
Don't Settle.... So keep looking until you find it. Don’t settle.” Steve Jobs #inspiration
#Running and #life are much the same. A fantastic support system of friends or family can make a big difference
Different people in your life for different reasons. Goodness can come from multiple sources. Take time on your runs to be #thankful
"Get busy living, or get busy dying" Shawshank Redemption #run
"Everything seems #impossible, until it's done." Nelson Mandela
#Running shirt on the back said... If you see me collapse, please hit 'Pause' on my garmin
It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.~Confucius #run
We acquire the #strength we have overcome. ~Ralph Waldo Emerson
"And you can #dream, so dream out loud." U2 via @LJ3000
The block of granite which was an obstacle in the pathway of the weak, became a stepping-stone in the pathway of the strong ~ Carlyle #run
#Running makes me feel alive, appreciate my legs, and the friends that run with me
The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love - H. Humphrey AND #running
The only one doubting you is you #run
Do you think something can never happen? Nope I don't either #run #goals #life #change #dreams
"The #heart has its reasons, which reason does not know." -Blaise Pascal
#Running is a balance of physical exertion, enhanced mental awareness and spiritual peace. (via @JeffGalloway)
Saucony slogan: "Maybe #strong is just what you have left when you've used up all your weak."
My #heart has a way of making my legs go
“You will never succeed beyond your wildest #dreams unless you are willing to have some wild dreams.” via @Kattemie
"If everything seems under control, you're just not going #fast enough." ~ Mario Andretti
If you want 2 become the best #runner you can be, start now. Dont spend the rest of your life wondering if you can do it" Welch
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of #life. ~Charles Darwin
“Hope is a #good thing, maybe the best thing, and no good thing ever dies” Shawshank Redemption
In the midst of regular #life, running is the touchstone that breathes adventure into my soul -Kristin Armstrong
#Life is meant to be lived. Take risks. Feel passion. Discover love. Run free.
"When you do something positive, even if no one else knows it or sees it, you are making a difference.” via @MiraclesGoddess
Those who #dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night - Edgar Allen Poe
Some have natural talent, others make up for it with tremendous heart #run
Surround yourself with people who believe in you, encourage you & help you exceed your #dreams
Often hear someone say I’m not a real runner.We are all #runners, some just run faster than others.I never met a fake runner via @BartYasso
Never give up on something that you can't go a day without thinking about.~Unknown #life #goals #dreams #love
"One is hardly sensible of fatigue while he marches to music." -Thomas Carlyle, Scottish writer and historian via @zumadog
Laziness is an option #run
I was born to run #thanksmom Happy Mother's Day
"Ever have that problem where the treadmill doesn't go #fast enough for ya?....... No me neither.” via @Mirindacarfrae
"You can't get fit in one workout, just as you can't live your life in one day." -Johnny G #running #quotes via @running_junkie
You know you're an #ultrarunner when you don't finish on the same day as the winner.” via @TheTrailJogger
To uncover your true potential you must first find your own limits and then you have to have the #courage to blow past them ~ Picabo Street
"If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary." -Jim Rohn
“There's no magic to running far or climbing Everest. Endurance is mental strength. It's all about heart.” Bear Grylls
"dont quiet them. embrace them. its natural, normal &shows how much you care. when the gun goes off they will be gone!” via @chrissiesmiles
"Some people think about making it happen and others make it happen!" #DO #IT
To dare is to lose one's footing momentarily. To not #dare is to lose oneself ~ Kierkegaard via @CharityIdeas @LJ3000
"Most mistakes in a #race are made in the first two minutes, perhaps in the very first minute." - Jack Daniels
"Keep some room in your #heart for the unimaginable." -Mary Oliver
"We were meant to live an extraordinary #life. Don't believe anything less. Never settle for ordinary.” via @JoshCox
What excites you? What makes you dream? #run #life
"Don't underestimate anyone around you. Everyone has the #power to surprise anyone at any point of time.” via @Kcancer
The way to know #life is to love many things. ~Vincent Van Gogh
Do not quench your #inspiration and your imagination; do not become the slave of your model. Vincent Van Gogh
“A true #friend sees the good in everything, and brings out the best in the worst of things.” Sasha Azevedo
"The only one who can tell you 'you can't ' is you. And you don't have to listen." - Nike #run
Never give up on something that #you can't go a day without thinking about.~Unknown
If we did the things we are capable of, we would astound ourselves. -Thomas Edison #run #achieve
No rules, change happens, embrace friends, challenge norm, live life #run
My daddy is faster than your daddy #HappyFathersDay
To all the dads who know how to get their run on #HappyFathersDay
Yes, you CAN do it. Did someone tell you, you can't?
Discover your gift and give it away
Punish me, make me #run
"Don't let fatigue make a coward of you."- Steve Prefontaine #run
"For me, like so many others, #running is the answer. Out on the road it is just you, the pavement, and your will" John Bingham
"Do these shorts make my ass look fast?" ~ #running shorts
"The joy was in the act of #running and in the journey, not in the destination." John Bingham
Start it, run it, push it, sweat it, grunt it, laugh it, finish it #marathon
Never underestimate the power of dreams and the influence of the human #spirit - Wilma Rudolph
Few of us know what we are capable of doing…we have never pushed ourselves hard enough to find out– Montapert #run
"I'll lean on you and you lean on me and we'll be okay." - Dave Matthews Band #friends #runningpartners #life
"But if you never try you'll never know...Just what you're worth" Fix You by Coldplay #inspire
I run because it's my passion, and not just a sport. - Sasha Azevedo
I run marathons #yes #for #fun
I live a life of my own design. I go with the flow that's uniquely mine. via @AnnTran_
"They who have #conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure." - James Allen
"Skill to do comes of doing." Ralph Waldo Emerson via @CharityIdeas #train
To settle is a choice, you can choose to run after your dreams #life #running
Some people say they don't have enough time to train. Others make it happen #noexcuses #run
"Believe that you're young enough, old enough, strong enough & so on to accomplish everything you want to do" John Bingham via #run
Be positive, ignore the critic, follow ur heart, invest in your passions, believe in ur dreams & get busy making them reality~ by @JoshCox
A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself. ~Joseph Campbell #charity #runners
The only disability in life is a bad attitude. -Scott Hamilton (via @rnrgirl) #run #train #marathon #endurance
"A river cuts through rock, not because of its power, but because of its persistence" ~Jim Watkins #run
